description: AMENDMENT TO RESPONSE DEADLINE CLOSING TIME:All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by June 5, 2024 at 2pm EDT. All bids submitted after will be declared non-responsive. This procurement contains a mandatory security requirement. At contract award, the Bidder must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS). Failure to meet this requirement will render the Bid non-compliant and no further consideration will be given to the Bid. There will be a site visit on May 14 at 10am.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### Remote Piloted Aircraft Infrastructure Project (RPAS)

**Tender Reference:** WS4277792818-Doc4563549579
**Publication Date:** May 3, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** June 5, 2024 at 14:00 EST

**Summary:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the Remote Piloted Aircraft Infrastructure Project (RPAS). The project aims to design, build, and maintain infrastructure for unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs) at a designated site in Ottawa, Ontario.

**Key Details:**
- **Solicitation Type:** Competitive - Open bidding
- **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
- **Mandatory Security Requirement:** At contract award, the Bidder must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS).

**Site Visit and Mandatory Requirements:**

* A site visit will be held on May 14 at 10:00 am at the designated site in Ottawa.
* Interested bidders must meet at the site and sign in at the commissionaire’s desk using a government-issued identification (e.g., driver's license).

**Bid Requirements:**

* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by June 5, 2024 at 14:00 EST.
* Bids submitted after this deadline will be declared non-responsive.

**Tender Documents:**

The tender documents can be accessed through the [Ariba Discovery](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19589930) platform. Please note that The Government of Canada's [Supplier Information Management](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/access-to-information/central-award-obligations-supplierinformation-management) (SIM) must be completed prior to registration.

If you have any inquiries or require further information, please contact Gillian Fenwick2 (SPAC/PSPC) at [gillian.fenwick2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:gillian.fenwick2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) regarding the project.

### Contact Information

Gillian Fenwick2 (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [gillian.fenwick2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:gillian.fenwick2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
